welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ksar Sghir, a charming city in Morocco known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boukhalef Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Front Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at North Front Airport offers exclusive services for high-profile travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
